casebody.data:
Haskins v. Stewart et al. (Supreme Court, General Term, Second Department. December, 1891.) Action by Mary Haskins as administratrix of her husband, Reuben Haskins, deceased, against James Stewart and George Stewart.

Argued before Barnard, P. J., and Pratt, J.

Ho opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs, on opinion by Barnard, P. J., on former appeal. 10 N. Y. Supp. 833. See, also, 11 N. Y. Supp. 942, mem.
